actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve the medicare-dependent, small rural hospital program.
short_title: Small Rural Hospital Program Improvement Act of 2000

summary.text: Small Rural Hospital Program Improvement Act of 2000 - Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to: (1) make the Medicare-dependent, small rural hospital program permanent; and (2) give any hospital under such program the option of basing eligibility for payment on discharges during any of the three most recent audited cost reporting periods in lieu of the current basing of eligibility for payment on discharges during the cost reporting period beginning in FY 1987.

titles.title: Small Rural Hospital Program Improvement Act of 2000
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to improve the medicare-dependent, small rural hospital program.
